clang-analyzer-core.uninitialized.NewArr.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-core.uninitialized.NewArraySize
Check if the size of the array in a new[] expression is undefined.
The
clang-analyzer-core.uninitialized.NewArraySize
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-core.uninitialized.NewArr.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
